branding.title: Reo Moana Puzzle
branding.subtitle: Polynesian Word Game
branding.description: This is an open source adaptation of the word guessing game Wordle, designed for Polynesian languages.

selectLetters.title: Select Letters:
selectLetters.description: Tap letters to form your guess. Each guess must be a valid {wordLength}-letter word.

formingWords.title: Forming Words:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Words must be spelled correctly using proper orthography.

submitAuto.title: Submit Your Guess:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Press Enter when your word is complete.

tips.title: Tips
tips.diacriticals: Use proper diacritics (kahakō and ʻokina) where required.

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Mahalo to Mary Boyce for the Māori word list used in this game.

about.title: About This Game
about.customizeText: and customize it for another language!
about.wordsSourced: The words for this game were sourced from

branding.title: Reo Moana: Hulihua
branding.subtitle: Pā'ani Hua'ōlelo Polenesia
branding.description: He mea kumu waiwai kēia o ka nane hua'ōlelo Wordle, ua hana 'ia no nā 'ōlelo Polenesia.

selectLetters.title: Koho i nā Kupu:
selectLetters.description: E kaomi i nā hua'ōlelo e hō'ike 'ia, No nā woela me ke kahakō, e kaomi a pa'a ma luna o ka woela E hō'ike 'ia ia woela me ka kahakō ma luna. E kaualakō i kou manamana lima i kuna ia wowela, a e ho'oku'u. 'O kekahi hua'ōlelo Hawai'i 'oia'i'o {wordLength} huapalapala kona lō'ihi.

formingWords.title: Ka moena o nā hua'ōlelo:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Koi 'ia ka pela pololei 'ana o nā hua'ōlelo me ka 'okina me ke kahakō ke pono.

submitAuto.title: Ho'okomo i kāu koho:
submitAuto.autoAppear: E kaomi iā Kāho'i ke piha pono kāu hua'ōlelo.

tips.title: Mana'o Kōkua
tips.diacriticals: E ho'ohana i nā māka Hawai'i (ke kahakō a me ka ʻokina) ma kahi e koi 'ia.

game.currentWord: Ka hua'ōlelo koho e kū ne

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Mahalo iā Mary Boyce no ka papa hua'ōlelo Māori e ho'ohana 'ia ma kēia pā'ani.

about.title: No Kēia Nane Hua'ōlelo
about.customizeText: a hana i kēia no kekahi 'ōlelo 'ē a'e!
about.wordsSourced: Ua komo 'ia nā hua'ōlelo o kēia pā'ani mai
about.playOriginal: A hiki nō ho'i iā 'oe ke

branding.title: Reo Māori Puzzle
branding.subtitle: Kēmu Kupu Poronēhia
branding.description: He taonga nā te iwi katoa tēnei o te kēmu kupu Wordle, kua hangaia mō ngā reo Poronesia.

selectLetters.title: Kōwhiria ngā reta:
selectLetters.description: Tāpahia ngā reta hei hanga kupu. Me whakatōhia tētahi kupu roa {wordLength} reta.

formingWords.title: Te Hanga Kupu:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Me tika ai te tuhituhi o ngā kupu.

submitAuto.title: Tukuna Tō Kupu:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Pēhia a Enter i roa ai tō kupu.

tips.title: Ngā Tohutohu
tips.diacriticals: Whakamahia ngā tohu (whakatōhia) i ngā wāhi tika.

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Mahalo to Mary Boyce for the Māori word list used in this game.

about.title: Mō Tēnei Kēmu
about.customizeText: ā whakaahuahia mō tētahi atu reo!
about.wordsSourced: Ngā kupu o tēnei kēmu i tangohia mai i
about.playOriginal: Rānei, ka āhei rānei koe ki te

branding.title: Reo Tahiti Puzzle
branding.subtitle: Tarava Parau Polinē
branding.description: He mea kino 'ore roa teie no te tarava parau Wordle, ua hanga hia no te mau reo Polinē.

selectLetters.title: Hiti i te mau reta:
selectLetters.description: Fa'i i te mau reta e hana ai i ta parau. E parau 'oia'i'o {wordLength} reta.

formingWords.title: Te Hana Parau:
formingWords.correctSpelling: E pono ia ai te fa'atura'a tika o te mau parau.

submitAuto.title: Fa'ahoro i ta 'oe Parau:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Tāpahi ia Enter ia roa ta 'oe parau.

tips.title: Mau Fa'aauara'a
tips.diacriticals: Fa'aaue i te mau fa'ailoga (tō me te hāmani) i te mau vahi e hinaaro ai.

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Mauruuru ia Mary Boyce no te papa parau Māori i fa'aaue i teie tarava.

about.title: No Teie Tarava
about.customizeText: a hanga i teie no ta'tahi atu reo!
about.wordsSourced: Ua riro mai te mau parau o teie tarava i

branding.title: Ta'aloga Upu Samoa
branding.subtitle: Ta'aloga Upu Polenisia
branding.description: O se fetuunaiga lelei lenei o le ta'aloga upu Wordle, ua fausia mo gagana Polenisia.

selectLetters.title: Filifili mata:
selectLetters.description: Tagofi mata e fai ai lau upu. O se upu moni {wordLength} mata.

formingWords.title: Faia Upu:
formingWords.correctSpelling: E tatau ona sa'o le tusi o upu.

submitAuto.title: Aumai lau Upu:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Kiliki ia Enter pe a uma lau upu.

tips.title: Fautuaga
tips.diacriticals: Fa'aaoga fa'ailoga tika (faatotoa ma faasino) pe a mana'omia.

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Fa'afetai ia Mary Boyce mo le lisi upu Māori na fa'aaogaina i lenei ta'aloga.

about.title: E Uiga i Lenei Ta'aloga
about.customizeText: ma fetuunai mo se isi gagana!
about.wordsSourced: Na maua upu o lenei ta'aloga mai

branding.title: Puzzle Reo Moana
branding.subtitle: Jeu de Mots Polynésiens
branding.description: Ceci est une adaptation open source du jeu de devinettes de mots Wordle, conçue pour les langues polynésiennes.

selectLetters.title: Sélectionner les Lettres:
selectLetters.description: Tapez les lettres pour former votre supposition. Chaque supposition doit être un mot valide de {wordLength} lettres.

formingWords.title: Formation des Mots:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Les mots doivent être épelés correctement en utilisant l'orthographe appropriée.

submitAuto.title: Soumettre Votre Supposition:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Appuyez sur Entrée quand votre mot est complet.

tips.title: Conseils
tips.diacriticals: Utilisez les diacritiques appropriés (macrons et apostrophes) où nécessaire.

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Merci à Mary Boyce pour la liste de mots maoris utilisée dans ce jeu.

about.title: À Propos de Ce Jeu
about.customizeText: et personnalisez-le pour une autre langue!
about.wordsSourced: Les mots de ce jeu proviennent de

branding.title: Rompecabezas Reo Moana
branding.subtitle: Juego de Palabras Polinesias
branding.description: Esta es una adaptación de código abierto del juego de adivinanzas de palabras Wordle, diseñado para idiomas polinesios.

selectLetters.title: Seleccionar Letras:
selectLetters.description: Toca las letras para formar tu suposición. Cada suposición debe ser una palabra válida de {wordLength} letras.

formingWords.title: Formando Palabras:
formingWords.correctSpelling: Las palabras deben estar deletreadas correctamente usando la ortografía apropiada.

submitAuto.title: Enviar Tu Suposición:
submitAuto.autoAppear: Presiona Enter cuando tu palabra esté completa.

tips.title: Consejos
tips.diacriticals: Usa diacríticos apropiados (macrones y apostrofes) donde sea necesario.

languageDropdown.acknowledgment: Gracias a Mary Boyce por la lista de palabras maoríes usada en este juego.

about.title: Acerca de Este Juego
about.wordsSourced: Las palabras de este juego fueron obtenidas de
